title: QueryMap
name: QueryMap
description:
Calls the given closure with every row in the given query.
		the function returns a query that contains all values returned by the closure.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description:
filter can be a function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(struct row[, number rowNumber, query query]):struct].
			The returned struct is used to fill a single query row.

arguments.name: maxThreads
arguments.description: maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false
